A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing is an understatement. After the previous 2 Disney instalments\, both of which I thoroughly enjoyed\, I had high hopes for the last Jedi. I wish I hadn’t bothered. I am not a Star Wars fanboy but am a big fan of the original series. The plot was littered with holes. Characters\, which were previously loved\, became annoying. The pointless Rose/Finn sub plot should have been cut. kylo Ren was reduced to an angsty teenager. Most of the dialogue was cringe worthy. It was too long!!! I was waiting for it to end. Bring back JJ Abrams!!!!!
